mapper.update: UPDATE EG_WORKS SET ALRAM_FIN_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE WORKS_IDX = #{works_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT W.*, M.MEM_NAME FROM EG_WORKS W, EG_TEAM T, EG_MEMBER M WHERE W.TEAM_IDX = T.TEAM_IDX AND W.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID AND W.TEAM_IDX = #{team_idx} AND DATE_FORMAT(W.WORKS_SDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{date} AND DATE_FORMAT(W.WORKS_EDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{date} AND W.WORKS_HIDE = 'N'
